attributes.action: Ban halal and kosher certification and slaughter
attributes.additional_details: At the very least such items should be clearly and prominently labeled. It is strictly forbidden for some Sikhs, Hindus, Buddhists and Christians to consume any halal or kosher certified product or religiously slaughtered meat. Without clear prominent labeling we could be consuming it without knowing. At the very least there should be clear prominent labeling so the public can make an informed choice.
attributes.background: Greece has banned kosher and halal slaughter. The Hellenic Council of State, announced the ban deeming them “inhumane." The courts found that the religious preparation of animal products did not outweigh the suffering of those animals' welfare, The British government should do the same.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614742
